Legendary Game. One Of The Very Best Game <3

I only played this a little while, also i haven't played a lot of CS:GO. But because i grow up playing the old CS (i forgot the name), seeing this is like a soft remake of the game. It's fun and like counter strike but for the big boys.

I don't know about the multiplayer, because i mainly play this to pass time and be a god (against easy bots). 

The bots will give a decent challenge, from easy to hard is like dark souls to sekiro, probably i just suck at it but it's really challanging (i don't know how to write it). 

My guess is for nostalgic but want a kind of new feeling, this one bridge between CS:GO and CS:OG (hey look at it).

5/7 :)
Золотая середина между CS 1.6 и CS:GO
it's like counter strike but its better and very easy i recommend this to cs go starters

Игра из моего детства, обожаю этот шедевр, графика радует, геймплей тоже, я не эксперт, но в любом случае, это шедевр. Всем советую. Игра из компьютерных клубов :)

mendiguei 0,50 pra comprar na promoção mas valeu apena kkkk , gráficos bons , jogabilidade boa e com aquele cheirinho de 1.6 <3 , agora sim minha coleção de Counter Strike estar completa :V LOL
Classique de Valve, ça ne m'étonne pas qu'il y ai encore des serveurs pleins.

Плюсы и минусы:
+ Множество серверов разный вкус и цвет
+ Очень мало читеров
- Но всетаки они (читеры) есть
+ Стабильная физика
+ Подойдет для владельцев старых\слабых ПК и ноутов
+ Минимум вечно орущей в микро школоты
+ Нет доната
+ Нет выпендрежа на счет скинов и т.п.
Que buen juego y seamos sinceros su física es un millon de veces mejor que el de csgo

I wasn't expecting To like this game as much as I do now. Whoa... This game is actually BETTER than Cs:GO! I cant believe it, its pretty much the same game but older, the achievements are exactly the same but easier to get depending on what servers you play on. Speaking of the servers, this game is different everytime I play it because the user made servers just add to the experiance like no other arena/team-vs-team  shooter. There is literally an endless amount of modes and fun to be had, i swear this game is different every time I play it because each server is so different from the last. Each with there own rules, weapons, maps, music and characters. Theres a final fantasy server with anime characters you play as with magic weapons and a giant boss to fight. Dude... There is no other multiplayer game on steam like this that I have seen. 

Thats just the gameplay, now lets talk about the real life people you play with in this game, the coolest funniest people, sure, there are some trolls, and some cringe lords, but it adds to the experience. I have yet to play on a silent server that has at least one person playing on it. The bot servers are actually cool to because the music and soundboards and announcers that come with each of them, and each of them unique from the "gotch'ya bitch" when you kill somebody with a knife to the "GOD LIKE, DOMINATING"! DOTA 2 ANOUNCER ON SOME SERVERS. Lol. This game is to cool to put into a such a tiny quick steam review. Lol. There is also some funny sprays from time to time, sometimes memes, sometimes just cool art. Always a conversation starter on team chat.

You know what... Im gonna do something crazy, im gonna give this game a perfect 10/10 score! Great fucking game! gg valve, gg.
